scenes.description: Otonose Kanade performs a solo of "Departures ～あなたにおくるアイの歌～".
scenes.song_name: Departures ～あなたにおくるアイの歌～

scenes.description: Todoroki Hajime and Otonose Kanade perform "LAKI MODE".

subtitles.original: Departures ～あなたにおくるアイの歌～
subtitles.english: Departures ~Anata ni Okuru Ai no Uta~

subtitles.original: あの時　あなたはなんて言ったの
subtitles.english: What did you say back then?

subtitles.original: 届かない言葉は宙を舞う
subtitles.english: The words that can't reach you dance in the air

subtitles.original: わかってるのに　今日もしてしまう
subtitles.english: Even though I know, I still find myself today...

subtitles.original: 叶わぬ願いごとを
subtitles.english: ...making a wish that won't come true.

subtitles.original: 離さないで　ぎゅっと
subtitles.english: Don't let go, hold me tight

subtitles.original: 手を握ってて
subtitles.english: Hold my hand

subtitles.original: あなたと二人　続くと言って
subtitles.english: Say that the two of us will go on together

subtitles.original: 繋いだその手は温かくて
subtitles.english: Those hands we held were so warm...

subtitles.original: 優しかった
subtitles.english: ...and so kind.

subtitles.original: あなたはいつもそうやって私を
subtitles.english: You always did that to me...

subtitles.original: 怒らせて最後に泣かすんだ
subtitles.english: ...making me angry and then crying in the end.

subtitles.original: だけど後になってごめんねと言う
subtitles.english: But then later you'd say "I'm sorry"...

subtitles.original: その顔好きだった
subtitles.english: ...I loved that face of yours.

subtitles.original: 離さないで　ぎゅっと　そう思いきり
subtitles.english: Don't let go, hold me tight, with all your might

subtitles.original: あなたの腕の中にいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be in your arms

subtitles.original: 二人でおでこを合わせながら
subtitles.english: As we press our foreheads together...

subtitles.original: 眠るの
subtitles.english: ...and fall asleep.

subtitles.original: 二度と会えないってことを知ってたの
subtitles.english: I knew that we would never meet again.

subtitles.original: 離さないで　ぎゅっと　あなたが好き
subtitles.english: Don't let go, hold me tight, I love you

subtitles.original: もう一度だって笑ってくれないの
subtitles.english: Won't you even smile for me one more time?

subtitles.original: あなたの温もりが消えちゃう前に
subtitles.english: Before your warmth disappears...

subtitles.original: 抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Hold me.

subtitles.original: LAKI MODE
subtitles.english: LAKI MODE

subtitles.original: 遠目仰いだ雲の上
subtitles.english: Above the clouds I gazed at from afar

subtitles.original: ベールに包まれた星待って
subtitles.english: Waiting for the stars wrapped in a veil

subtitles.original: 流れ落ちてきた光にまたがって
subtitles.english: Astride the light that came falling down

subtitles.original: 一緒に浮遊飛行しよう
subtitles.english: Let's go on a floating flight together

subtitles.original: ルカマスの星たちが嬉々としてステップ刻んで
subtitles.english: The stars of Rukamasu lively treading steps

subtitles.original: 我が物顔でなびくアイソレーション　きらめき噛む絶対零度
subtitles.english: Isolation fluttering as if it owns the place, biting the sparkle, absolute zero

subtitles.original: 冴えない夢にはおあいそ
subtitles.english: A courtesy for the dull dreams

subtitles.original: 花咲く笑顔が似合いそう
subtitles.english: A blooming smile would surely suit you

subtitles.original: 色褪せぬパラティソ踊ろうよ Under the starlight
subtitles.english: Let's dance in the unfading paradise, under the starlight

subtitles.original: 流れに身を委ねて
subtitles.english: Entrusting your body to the flow
